question_text: Who was Japan's Prime Minister after Ichirō Hatoyama left office on December 23, 1956?

message_list.content: Who was Japan's Prime Minister after Ichirō Hatoyama left office on December 23, 1956?

sampler_config.system_message: You are a helpful assistant. Answer questions based on your training knowledge.

request_data.question_preview: Who was Japan's Prime Minister after Ichirō Hatoyama left office on December 23, 1956?

response_data.response_preview: After Ichirō Hatoyama left office on December 23, 1956, the next Prime Minister of Japan was Nobusuke Kishi. He took office on February 25, 1957.

response_text: After Ichirō Hatoyama left office on December 23, 1956, the next Prime Minister of Japan was Nobusuke Kishi. He took office on February 25, 1957.
